Package socialmedia

Class Post

java.lang.Object
socialmedia.Post
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Comment, Endorsement
public class Post
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Post is a class that encapsulates post functionality. An instance of the Post class can be commented on, Endorsed. Both of which are available in the comments and endorsements ArrayLists within the class. The Post stores the ID of the Account that posted it to allow for the Account records, e.g. numEndorsements, numCounts etc., can be kept consistent. Post also implements serializable which allows for the Platform to be saved and loaded within the SocialMedia class.
See Also:
Serialized Form
